UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of stapled antimicrobial peptides that are stable, nontoxic and kill antibiotic-resistant bacteria in mice.
Literature.Author: Mourtada R, Herce HD, Yin DJ, Moroco JA, Wales TE, Engen JR,  Walensky LD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human renal proximal tubular epithelial cells (HRPTEC):90.5% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=12.50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>50µg/ml)
